verses.verse: Arise, <S%H6965><s%> <S%H215>shine;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thy <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H935>come,<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H2224>risen<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee.

For, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H2822>darkness<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and gross <S%H6205>darkness<s%> the <S%H3816>people:<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H2224>arise<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, and his <S%H3519>glory<s%> shall be <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee.
And the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> shall <S%H1980>come<s%> to thy <S%H216>light,<s%> and <S%H4428>kings<s%> to the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> of thy <S%H2225>rising.<s%>

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> and <S%H7200>see:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> they gather themselves <S%H6908>together,<s%> they <S%H935>come<s%> to thee: thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H4480>far,<s%> <S%H7350><s%> and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H539>nursed<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> thy <S%H6654>side.<s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> thou shalt <S%H7200>see,<s%> and flow <S%H5102>together,<s%> and thine <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall <S%H6342>fear,<s%> and be <S%H7337>enlarged;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H1995>abundance<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall be <S%H2015>converted<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> thee, the <S%H2428>forces<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto thee.

The <S%H8229>multitude<s%> of <S%H1581>camels<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> thee, the <S%H1070>dromedaries<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> and <S%H5891>Ephah;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> they from <S%H4480>Sheba<s%> <S%H7614><s%> shall <S%H935>come:<s%> they shall <S%H5375>bring<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3828>incense;<s%> and they shall show <S%H1319>forth<s%> the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar<s%> shall be gathered <S%H6908>together<s%> unto thee, the <S%H352>rams<s%> of <S%H5032>Nebaioth<s%> shall <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto thee: they shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> <S%H7522>acceptance<s%> on mine <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and I will <S%H6286>glorify<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H8597>glory.<s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> are <S%H428>these<s%> that <S%H5774>fly<s%> as a <S%H5645>cloud,<s%> and as the <S%H3123>doves<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> their <S%H699>windows?<s%>

Surely <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H339>isles<s%> shall <S%H6960>wait<s%> for me, and the <S%H591>ships<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> <S%H7223>first,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> from <S%H4480>far,<s%> <S%H7350><s%> their <S%H3701>silver<s%> and their <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them, unto the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> and to the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he hath <S%H6286>glorified<s%> thee.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5236>strangers<s%> shall build <S%H1129>up<s%> thy <S%H2346>walls,<s%> and their <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto thee: <S%H3588>for<s%> in my <S%H7110>wrath<s%> I <S%H5221>smote<s%> thee, but in my <S%H7522>favor<s%> have I had <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on thee.

Therefore thy <S%H8179>gates<s%> shall be <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H8548>continually;<s%> they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H5462>shut<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> nor <S%H3915>night;<s%> that men may <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee the <S%H2428>forces<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles,<s%> and that their <S%H4428>kings<s%> may be <S%H5090>brought.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H1471>nation<s%> and <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> thee shall <S%H6>perish;<s%> yea, those <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall be utterly <S%H2717>wasted.<s%> <S%H2717><s%>

The <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, the fir <S%H1265>tree,<s%> the pine <S%H8410>tree,<s%> and the <S%H8391>box<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> to <S%H6286>beautify<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of my <S%H4720>sanctuary;<s%> and I will make the <S%H4725>place<s%> of my <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H3513>glorious.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> also of them that <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> thee shall <S%H1980>come<s%> <S%H7817>bending<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee; and <S%H3605>all<s%> they that <S%H5006>despised<s%> thee shall bow themselves <S%H7812>down<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of thy <S%H7272>feet;<s%> and they shall <S%H7121>call<s%> thee, The <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> The <S%H6726>Zion<s%> of the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Whereas <S%H8478><s%> thou hast <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> and <S%H8130>hated,<s%> so that no <S%H369>man<s%> went <S%H5674>through<s%> thee, I will <S%H7760>make<s%> thee an <S%H5769>eternal<s%> <S%H1347>excellency,<s%> a <S%H4885>joy<s%> of many <S%H1755>generations.<s%> <S%H1755><s%>

Thou shalt also <S%H3243>suck<s%> the <S%H2461>milk<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles,<s%> and shalt <S%H3243>suck<s%> the <S%H7699>breast<s%> of <S%H4428>kings:<s%> and thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> am thy <S%H3467>Savior<s%> and thy <S%H1350>Redeemer,<s%> the mighty <S%H46>One<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

For <S%H8478><s%> <S%H5178>brass<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H8478>for<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H8478>for<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and <S%H8478>for<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H1270>iron:<s%> I will also <S%H7760>make<s%> thy <S%H6486>officers<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and thine <S%H5065>exactors<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

Violence <S%H2555><s%> shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in thy <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H7701>wasting<s%> nor <S%H7667>destruction<s%> within thy <S%H1366>borders;<s%> but thou shalt <S%H7121>call<s%> thy <S%H2346>walls<s%> <S%H3444>Salvation,<s%> and thy <S%H8179>gates<s%> <S%H8416>Praise.<s%>

The <S%H8121>sun<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> thy <S%H216>light<s%> by <S%H3119>day;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> for <S%H5051>brightness<s%> shall the <S%H3394>moon<s%> give <S%H215>light<s%> unto thee: but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> unto thee an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%> and thy <S%H430>God<s%> thy <S%H8597>glory.<s%>

Thy <S%H8121>sun<s%> shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> go <S%H935>down;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall thy <S%H3391>moon<s%> withdraw <S%H622>itself:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> thine <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%> and the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H60>mourning<s%> shall be <S%H7999>ended.<s%>

Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> also shall be <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6662>righteous:<s%> they shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> the <S%H5342>branch<s%> of my <S%H4302>planting,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands,<s%> that I may be <S%H6286>glorified.<s%>

A little <S%H6996>one<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and a small <S%H6810>one<s%> a <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H1471>nation:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H2363>hasten<s%> it in his <S%H6256>time.<s%>
